title: Did DNA Confirm Hakeem from ‘Empire’ Is Jay-Z’s Biological Son?
subtitle: Reports that a DNA test confirmed actor Bryshere Y. Gray, who plays Hakeem Lyon on the TV series 'Empire,' is the son of rap mogul Jay-Z are fake news.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A DNA test confirmed that actor Bryshere Y. Gray is the biological son of rap mogu Jay-Z.
